hotels.title: UK Lakeside Birmingham Escape Adjacent to National Exhibition Centre
hotels.description: Experience the endless entertainment and sprawling shops of the National Exhibition Centre from the stylish Crowne Plaza Birmingham NEC, an IHG Hotel. Nestled next to the glittering Pendigo Lake, the hotel is adjacent to the 11-screen cinema and casino at Resorts World Birmingham, as well as the concerts at Resorts World Arena. After days of fun out on the town, dine at the sumptuous Eleven Bar and Grill, keep up your fitness routine in the gym or enjoy a drink at Lobbyist Lounge Bar.

hotels.title: UK Central Birmingham City Break near Grand Central Station
hotels.description: Birmingham's bustling centre beckons visitors to explore - and where better to discover this charming heritage city than at Crowne Plaza Birmingham City Centre, an IHG Hotel? Indulge in sumptuous cuisine at B1 Restaurant and keep up with your fitness routine at the onsite gym before heading out to explore the sights. Find yourself under 10 minutes' walk from Grand Central Station and the elegant Symphony Hall, considered to be one of the finest concert halls in the world.
